words.translation: Exalted|(is) the One Who|took|His servant|(by) night|from|Al-Masjid|Al-Haraam|to|Al-Masjid|Al-Aqsa|which|We blessed|its surroundings|that We may show him|of|Our Signs|Indeed He|He|(is) the All-Hearer|the All-Seer

translations.1: Subhaanal lazeee asraa bi'abdihee lailam minal Masjidil Haraami ilal Masjidil Aqsal lazee baaraknaa haw-lahoo linuriyahoo min aayaatinaa; innahoo Huwas Samee'ul Baseer

words.translation: And We gave|Musa|the Book|and made it|a guidance|for the Children|(of) Israel|That not|you take|other than Me|other than Me|(as) a Disposer of affairs

translations.1: Wa-aatainaa Moosal Kitaaba Wa-ja'alnaahu hudal liBaneee Israaa'eel; allaa tat-takhizoo min doonee wakeelaa.

words.translation: Offsprings|(of one) who|We carried|with|Nuh|Indeed he|was|a servant|grateful

translations.1: Zurriyyata man hamalnaa ma'a Nooh innahoo kaana 'abdan shakooraa

words.translation: And We decreed|for|(the) Children|(of) Israel|in|the Book|Surely you will cause corruption|in|the earth|twice|and surely you will reach|haughtiness|great

translations.1: Wa qadainaaa ilaa Baneee Israaa'eela fil Kitaabi latufsidunna fil ardi marratain; Wa-lata'lunna'uluwwan kabeeraa

words.translation: So when|came|(the) promise|(for) the first of the two|We raised|against you|servants|of Ours|those of great military might|those of great military might|those of great military might|and they entered|the inner most part|(of) the homes|and (it) was|a promise|fulfilled

translations.1: Fa-izaa jaaa'a wa'du oolaahumaa ba'asnaaa 'alykum 'ibaadal lanaaa ulee baasin shadeedin fajaasoo khilaalad diyaar; Wa-kaana wa'dam maf'oolaa

words.translation: Then|We gave back|to you|the return victory|over them|And We reinforced you|with the wealth|and sons|and made you|more|numerous

translations.1: Summa radadnaa lakumul karrata 'alaihim Wa-amdad-naakum-bi amwaalinuw Wa-baneen; Wa-ja'alnaakum aksara nafeeraa

words.translation: If|you do good|you do good|for yourselves|and if|you do evil|then it is for it|So when|came|promise|the last|to sadden|your faces|and to enter|the Masjid|just as|they (had) entered it|first|time|and to destroy|what|they had conquered|(with) destruction

translations.1: In ahsantum ahsantum li-anfusikum Wa-in asaatum falahaa; fa-izaa jaaa'a wa'dul aakhirati liyasooo'oo wujoo-hakum Wa-liyadkhulul masjida kamaa dakhaloohu awwala marratinw Wa-liyutabbiroo maa a'law tatbeera

words.translation: (It) may be|that your Lord|that your Lord|(may) have mercy upon you|But if|you return|We will return|And We have made|Hell|for the disbelievers|a prison-bed

translations.1: Asaa rabbukum aien yarhamakum; Wa-in 'uttum 'udnaa; Wa-ja'alnaa jahannama lilkaafireena haseera

words.translation: Indeed|this|the Quran|guides|to that|which|(is) most straight|and gives glad tidings|to the believers|those who|do|the righteous deeds|that|for them|(is) a reward|great

translations.1: Inna haazal Quraana yahdee lillatee hiya aqwamu Wa-yubashshirul mu'mineenal lazeena ya'maloonas saalihaati anna lahum ajran kabeeraa

words.translation: And that|those who|(do) not|believe|in the Hereafter|We have prepared|for them|a punishment|painful

translations.1: Wa-annal lazeena laa yu'minoona bil-aakhirati a'tadnaa lahum 'azaaban aleemaa

words.translation: And prays|the man|for evil|(as) he prays|for the good|And is|the man|ever hasty

translations.1: Wa-yad'ul insaanu bishsharri du'aaa-'ahoo bilkhayr; Wa-kaanal insaanu 'ajoola

words.translation: And We have made|the night|and the day|(as) two signs|Then We erased|(the) sign|(of) the night|and We made|(the) sign|(of) the day|visible|that you may seek|bounty|from|your Lord|and that you may know|(the) number|(of) the years|and the account|And every|thing|We have explained it|(in) detail

translations.1: Wa-ja'alnal laila wannahaara Aayatayni famahawnaaa Aayatal laili Wa-ja'alnaaa Aayatan nahaari mubsiratal litabtaghoo fadlam mir Rabbikum Wa-lita'lamoo 'adadas sineena walhisaab; Wa-kulla shai'in fassalnaahu tafseelaa

words.translation: And (for) every|man|We have fastened to him|his fate|in|his neck|and We will bring forth|for him|(on the) Day|(of) the Resurrection|a record|which he will find|wide open

translations.1: Wa-kulla insaanin alzamnaahu taaa'irahoo fee 'unuqihee Wa-nukhriji lahoo Yawmal Qiyaamati kitaabany yalqaahu manshooraa

words.translation: Read|your record|Sufficient|(is) yourself|today|against you|(as) accountant

translations.1: Iqra kitaabaka kafaa bi-nafsikal Yawma 'alaika haseebaa

words.translation: Whoever|(is) guided|then only|he is guided|for his soul|And whoever|goes astray|then only|he goes astray|against it|And not|will bear|one laden with burden|burden|(of) another|And not|We|are to punish|until|We have sent|a Messenger

translations.1: Manih tadaa fa-innamaa yahtadee linafsihee Wa-man dalla fa-innamaa yadillu 'alaihaa; Wa-laa taziru waaziratunw wizra ukhraa; Wa-maa kunnaa mu'azzibeena hatta nab'asa Rasoola

words.translation: And when|We intend|that|We destroy|a town|We order|its wealthy people|but they defiantly disobey|therein|so (is) proved true|against it|the word|and We destroy it|(with) destruction

translations.1: Wa-izaaa aradnaaa an nuhlika qaryatan amarnaa mutrafeehaa fafasaqoo feehaa fahaqqa 'alaihal qawlu fadammarnaahaa tadmeeraa

words.translation: And how many|We destroyed|from|the generations|after|after|Nuh|And sufficient|(is) your Lord|concerning the sins|(of) His servants|All-Aware|All-Seer

translations.1: Wa-kam ahlaknaa minal qurooni min ba'di Nooh; Wa-kafaa bi-Rabbika bizunoobi 'ibaadihee Khabeeram Baseeraa

words.translation: Whoever|should|desire|the immediate|We hasten|for him|in it|what|We will|to whom|We intend|Then|We have made|for him|Hell|he will burn|disgraced|rejected

translations.1: Man kaana yureedul 'aajilata 'ajjalnaa lahoo feehaa maa nashaaa'u liman nureedu summa ja'alnaa lahoo Jahannama yaslaahaa mazmoomammad hooraa

words.translation: And whoever|desires|the Hereafter|and exerts|for it|the effort|while he|(is) a believer|then those|[are]|their effort|(is) appreciated

translations.1: Wa-man araadal Aakhirata Wa-sa'aa lahaa sa'yahaa Wa-huwa mu'minun fa-ulaaa'ika kaana sa'yuhum mashkooraa

words.translation: (To) each|We extend|(to) these|and (to) these|from|(the) gift|(of) your Lord|And not|is|(the) gift|(of) your Lord|restricted

translations.1: Kullan numiddu haaa-'ulaaa'i Wa-haaa'ulaaa'i min 'ataaa'i rabbik; Wa-maa kaana 'ataaa'u rabbika mahzooraa

words.translation: See|how|We preferred|some of them|over|others|And surely the Hereafter|(is) greater|(in) degrees|and greater|(in) excellence

translations.1: Unzur kaifa faddalnaa ba'dahum 'alaa ba'd; Wa-lal-Aakhiratu akbaru darajaatinw Wa-akbaru tafdeelaa

words.translation: (Do) not|make|with|Allah|god|another|lest you will sit|disgraced|forsaken

translations.1: Laa taj'al ma'al laahi ilaahan aakhara fataq'uda mazoomam makhzoolaa

words.translation: And has decreed|your Lord|that (do) not|worship|except|Him Alone|and to the parents|(be) good|Whether|reach|with you|the old age|one of them|or|both of them|then (do) not|say|to both of them|a word of disrespect|and (do) not|repel them|but speak|to them|a word|noble

translations.1: Wa qadaa Rabbuka allaa ta'budooo illaaa iyyaahu Wa-bilwaalidaini ihsaanaa; immaa yablughanna 'indakal kibara ahaduhumaaa aw kilaahumaa falaa taqul lahumaaa uffinw Wa-laa tanharhumaa Wa-qullahumaa qawlan kareemaa

words.translation: And lower|to them|(the) wing|(of) humility|(out) of|[the] mercy|and say|My Lord!|Have mercy on both of them|as|they brought me up|(when I was) small

translations.1: Wakhfid lahumaa janaahaz zulli minar rahmati Wa-qur Rabbir hamhumaa kamaa rabbayaanee sagheera

words.translation: Your Lord|(is) most knowing|of what|(is) in|yourselves|If|you are|righteous|then indeed He|is|to those who often turn (to Him)|Most Forgiving

translations.1: Rabbukum a'lamu bimaa fee nufoosikum; in takoonoo saaliheena fa-innahoo kaana lil-awwaabeena Ghafoooraa

words.translation: And give|the relatives|the relatives|his right|and the needy|and the wayfarer|and the wayfarer|and (do) not|spend|wastefully

translations.1: Wa-aati zal qurbaa haqqahoo walmiskeena wabnas sabeeli Wa-laa tubazzir tabzeeraa

words.translation: Indeed|the spendthrifts|are|brothers|(of) the devils|And is|the Shaitaan|to his Lord|ungrateful

translations.1: Innal mubazzireena kaanoo ikhwaanash shayaateeni Wa-kaanash shaytaanu li-Rabbihee kafooraa

words.translation: And if|you turn away|from them|seeking|mercy|from|your Lord|which you expect|then say|to them|a word|gentle

translations.1: Wa-immaa tu'ridanna 'anhum ubtighaaa'a rahmatim mir rabbika tarjoohaa faqul lahum qawlam maisooraa

words.translation: And (do) not|make|your hand|chained|to|your neck|and not|extend it|(to its) utmost|reach|so that you sit|blameworthy|insolvent

translations.1: Wa-laa taj'al yadaka maghloolatan ilaa 'unuqika Wa-laa tabsut-haa kullal basti fataq'uda maloomam mahsooraa

words.translation: Indeed|your Lord|extends|the provision|for whom|He wills|and straitens|Indeed He|is|of His slaves|All-Aware|All-Seer

translations.1: Inna Rabbaka yabsutur rizqa limaien yashaaa'u Wa-yaqdir; innahoo kaana bi'ibaadihee Khabeeran Baseera

words.translation: And (do) not|kill|your children|(for) fear|(of) poverty|We|(We) provide for them|and for you|Indeed|their killing|is|a sin|great

translations.1: Wa-laa taqtulooo awlaadakum khashyata imlaaqin nahnu narzuquhum Wa-iyyaakum; inna qatlahum kaana khit-'an kabeeraa

words.translation: And (do) not|go near|adultery|Indeed it|is|an immorality|and (an) evil|way

translations.1: Wa-laa taqrabuz zinaaa innahoo kaana faahishatanw Wa-saaa'a sabeelaa

words.translation: And (do) not|kill|the soul|which|Allah has forbidden|Allah has forbidden|except|by right|And whoever|(is) killed|wrongfully|verily|We have made|for his heir|an authority|but not|he should exceed|in|the killing|Indeed, he|is|helped

translations.1: Wa-laa taqtulun nafsal latee harramal laahu illaa bilhaqq; Wa-man qutila mazlooman faqad ja'alnaa liwaliyyihee sultaanan falaa yusrif fil qatli innahoo kaana mansooraa

words.translation: And (do) not|come near|(the) wealth|(of) the orphan|except|with what|[it] is|best|until|he reaches|his maturity|And fulfil|the covenant|Indeed|the covenant|will be|questioned

translations.1: Wa-laa taqraboo maalal yateemi illaa billatee hiya ahsanu hattaa yablugha ashuddah; Wa-awfoo bil'ahd, innal 'ahda kaana mas'oolaa

words.translation: And give full|[the] measure|when|you measure|and weigh|with the balance|the straight|That|(is) good|and best|(in) result

translations.1: Wa-awful kaila izaa kiltum Wa-zinoo bilqistaasil mustaqeem; zaalika khairunw Wa-ahsanu ta'weelaa

words.translation: And (do) not|pursue|what|not|you have|of it|any knowledge|Indeed|the hearing|and the sight|and the heart|all|those|will be|[about it]|questioned

translations.1: Wa-laa taqfu maa laisa laka bihee 'ilm; innas sam'a walbasara walfu'aada kullu ulaaa'ika kaana 'anhu mas'oolaa

words.translation: And (do) not|walk|in|the earth|(with) insolence|Indeed you|will never|tear|the earth|and will never|reach|the mountains|(in) height

translations.1: Wa-laa tamshi fil ardi marahan innaka lan takhriqal arda Wa-lan tablughal jibaala toola

words.translation: All|that|is|[its] evil|near|your Lord|hateful

translations.1: Kullu zaalika kaana sayyi'uhoo inda Rabbika makroohaa

words.translation: That|(is) from what|(was) revealed|to you|(from) your Lord|of|the wisdom|And (do) not|make|with|Allah|god|other|lest you should be thrown|in|Hell|blameworthy|abandoned

translations.1: Zaalika mimmaaa awhaaa ilaika Rabbuka minal hikmah; Wa-laa taj'al ma'al laahi ilaahan aakhara fatulqaa fee Jahannama maloomammad hooraa

words.translation: Then has chosen (for) you|your Lord|sons|and He has taken|from|the Angels|daughters|Indeed, you|surely say|a word|grave

translations.1: Afa-asfaakum rabbukum bilbaneena wattakhaza minal malaaa'ikati inaasaa; innakum lataqooloona qawlan 'azeema

words.translation: And verily|We have explained|in|this|the Quran|that they may take heed|but not|it increases them|except|(in) aversion

translations.1: Wa-laqad sarrafnaa fee haazal Quraani liyazzakkaroo Wa-maa yazeeduhum illaa nufooraa

words.translation: Say|If|(there) were|with Him|gods|as|they say|then|surely they (would) have sought|to|(the) Owner|(of) the Throne|a way

translations.1: Qul law kaana ma'ahooo aalihatun kamaa yaqooloona izal labtaghaw ilaa zil 'Arshi Sabeela

words.translation: Glorified is He|and Exalted is He|above what|they say|(by) height|great

translations.1: Subhaanahoo Wa-Ta'aalaa 'ammaa yaqooloona 'uluwwan kabeeraa

words.translation: Glorify|[to] Him|the seven heavens|the seven heavens|and the earth|and whatever|(is) in them|And (there is) not|any|thing|except|glorifies|His Praise|but|not|you understand|their glorification|Indeed, He|is|Ever-Forbearing|Oft-Forgiving

translations.1: Tusabbihu lahus samaawaatus sab'u wal-ardu Wa-man feehinn; Wa-im min shai'in illaa yusabbihu bihamdihee Wa-laakil laa tafqahoona tasbeehahum; innahoo kaana Haleeman Ghafooraa

words.translation: And when|you recite|the Quran|We place|between you|and between|those who|(do) not|believe|in the Hereafter|a barrier|hidden

translations.1: Wa-izaa qara'-tal Quraana ja'alnaa bainaka Wa-bainal lazeena laa yu'minoona bil-aakhirati hijaabam mastooraa

words.translation: And We have placed|over|their hearts|coverings|lest|they understand it|and in|their ears|deafness|And when|you mention|your Lord|in|the Quran|Alone|they turn|on|their backs|(in) aversion

translations.1: Wa-ja'alnaa 'alaa quloo-bihim akinnatan any yafqahoohu Wa-feee aazaanihim waqraa; Wa-izaa zakarta Rabbaka fil Quraani wahdahoo wallaw 'alaaa adbaarihim nufooraa

words.translation: We|know best|[of] what|they listen|to [it]|when|they listen|to you|and when|they|(are) in private conversation|when|say|the wrongdoers|Not|you follow|but|a man|bewitched

translations.1: Nahnu a'lamu bimaa yastami'oona biheee iz yastami'oona ilaika Wa-iz hum najwaaa iz yaqooluz zaalimoona in tattabi'oona illaa rajulam mas-hooraa

words.translation: See|how|they put forth|for you|the examples|but they have gone astray|so not|they can|(find) a way

translations.1: Unzur kaifa daraboo lakal amsaala fadalloo falaa yastatee'oona sabeelaa

words.translation: And they say|Is it when|we are|bones|and crumbled particles|will we|surely (be) resurrected|(as) a creation|new

translations.1: Wa-qaalooo 'a-izaa kunnaa 'izaamanw Wa-rufaatan 'a-innaa lamab'oosoona khalqan jadeedaa

words.translation: Say|Be|stones|or|iron

translations.1: Qul koonoo hijaaratan aw hadeedaa

words.translation: Or|a creation|of what|(is) great|in|your breasts|Then they will say|Who|will restore us|Say|He Who|created you|(the) first|time|Then they will shake|at you|their heads|and they say|When (will)|it (be)|Say|Perhaps|that|(it) will be|soon

translations.1: Aw khalqam mimmaa yakburu fee sudoorikum; fasa-yaqooloona maien yu'eedunaa qulil lazee fatarakum awwala marrah; fasa yunghidoona ilaika ru'oosahum Wa-yaqooloona mataahoo; qul 'asaaa any yakoona qareeba

words.translation: (On) the Day|He will call you|and you will respond|with His Praise|and you will think|not|you had remained|except|a little (while)

translations.1: Yawma yad'ookum fatastajeeboona bihamdihee Wa-tazunnoona il labistum illaa qaleela

words.translation: And say|to My slaves|(to) say|that|which|(is) best|Indeed|the Shaitaan|sows discord|between them|Indeed|the Shaitaan|is|to the man|an enemy|clear

translations.1: Wa-qul li'ibaadee yaqoolul latee hiya ahsan; innash shaitaana yanzaghu bainahum; innash shaitaana kaana lil-insaani 'aduwwam mubeenaa

words.translation: Your Lord|(is) most knowing|of you|If|He wills|He will have mercy on you|or|if|He wills|He will punish you|And not|We have sent you|over them|(as) a guardian

translations.1: Rabbukum a'lamu bikum iny yasha' yarhamkum aw iny yasha' yu'azzibkum; Wa-maaa arsalnaaka 'alaihim wakeelaa

words.translation: And your Lord|(is) most knowing|of whoever|(is) in|the heavens|and the earth|And verily|We have preferred|some|(of) the Prophets|to|others|And We gave|Dawood|Zaboor

translations.1: Wa-Rabbuka a'lamu biman fis samaawaati wal-ard; Wa-laqad faddalnaa ba'dan Nabiyyeena 'alaa ba'dinw Wa-aatainaaa Daawooda Zabooraa

words.translation: Say|Call|those whom|you claimed|besides Him|besides Him|[then] not|they have power|(to) remove|the misfortunes|from you|and not|(to) transfer (it)

translations.1: Qulid 'ul lazeena za'amtum min doonihee falaa yamlikoona kashfad durri 'ankum Wa-laa tahweelaa

words.translation: Those|whom|they call|seek|to|their Lord|the means of access|which of them|(is) nearest|and they hope|(for) His mercy|and fear|His punishment|Indeed|(the) punishment|(of) your Lord|is|(ever) feared

translations.1: Ulaaa'ikal lazeena yad'oona yabtaghoona ilaa Rabbihimul waseelata ayyuhum aqrabu Wa-yarjoona rahmatahoo Wa-yakhaafoona 'azaabah; inna 'azaaba rabbika kaana mahzooraa

words.translation: And not|(is) any|town|but|We|(will) destroy it|before|(the) Day|(of) the Resurrection|or|punish it|with a punishment|severe|That is|That is|in|the Book|written

translations.1: Wa-in min qaryatin illaa Nahnu muhlikoohaa qabla Yawmil Qiyaamati aw mu'az-ziboohaa 'azaaban shadeedaa; kaana zaalika fil Kitaabi mastooraa

words.translation: And not|stopped Us|that|We send|the Signs|except|that|denied|them|the former (people)|And We gave|Thamud|the she-camel|(as) a visible sign|but they wronged|her|And not|We send|the Signs|except|(as) a warning

translations.1: Wa-maa mana'anaaa an nursila bil-aayaati illaaa an kazzaba bihal awwaloon; Wa-aatainaa Samoodan naaqata mubsiratan fazalamoo bihaa; Wa-maa nursilu bil-aayaati illaa takhweefaa

words.translation: And when|We said|to you|Indeed|your Lord|has encompassed|the mankind|And not|We made|the vision|which|We showed you|except|(as) a trial|for mankind|and the tree|the accursed|in|the Quran|And We threaten them|but not|it increases them|except|(in) transgression|great

translations.1: Wa-iz qulnaa laka inna rabbaka ahaata binnaas; Wa-maa ja'alnar ru'yal lateee arainaaka illaa fitnatal linnaasi washshajaratal mal'oonata fil quraan; Wa-nukhaw-wifuhum famaa yazeeduhum illa tughyaanan kabeeraa

words.translation: And when|We said|to the Angels|Prostrate|to Adam|So they prostrated|except|Iblis|He said|Shall I prostrate|to (one) whom|You created|(from) clay

translations.1: Wa-iz qulnaa lilma-laaa'ikatis judoo li-Aadama fasajadooo illaaa Ibleesa qaala 'a-asjudu liman khalaqta teena

words.translation: He said|Do You see|this|whom|You have honored|above me|If|You give me respite|till|(the) Day|(of) the Resurrection|I will surely destroy|his offspring|except|a few

translations.1: Qaala ara'aytaka haazal lazee karramta 'alaiya la'in akhartani ilaa Yawmil Qiyaamati la-ahtanikanna zurriyyatahooo illaa qaleelaa

words.translation: He said|Go|and whoever|follows you|among them|then indeed|Hell|(is) your recompense|a recompense|ample

translations.1: Qaalaz hab faman tabi'aka minhum fa-inna Jahannama jazaaa'ukum jazaaa'am mawfooraa

words.translation: And incite|whoever|you can|among them|with your voice|and assault|[on] them|with your cavalry|and infantry|and be a partner|in|the wealth|and the children|and promise them|And not|promises them|the Shaitaan|except|delusion

translations.1: Wastafziz manis tata'ta minhum bisawtika Wa-ajlib 'alaihim bikhailika Wa-rajilika Wa-shaarik-hum fil amwaali wal-awlaadi Wa-'idhum; Wa-maa ya'iduhumush Shaitaanu illaa ghurooraa

words.translation: Indeed|My slaves|not|for you|over them|any authority|And sufficient|(is) your Lord|(as) a Guardian

translations.1: Inna 'ibaadee laisa laka 'alaihim sultaan; Wa-kafaa bi-Rabbika Wakeelaa

words.translation: Your Lord|(is) the One Who|drives|for you|the ship|in|the sea|that you may seek|of|His Bounty|Indeed He|is|to you|Ever Merciful

translations.1: Rabbukumul lazee yuzjee lakumul fulka fil bahri litabtaghoo min fadlih; innahoo kaana bikum Raheemaa

words.translation: And when|touches you|the hardship|in|the sea|lost|(are) who|you call|except|Him Alone|But when|He delivers you|to|the land|you turn away|And is|man|ungrateful

translations.1: Wa-izaa massakumud durru fil bahri dalla man tad'oona illaaa iyyaahu falammaa najjaakum ilal barri a'radtum; Wa-kaanal insaanu kafooraa

words.translation: Do you then feel secure|that (not)|He will cause to swallow|you|side|(of) the land|or|send|against you|a storm of stones|Then|not|you will find|for you|a guardian

translations.1: Afa-amintum aien yakhsifa bikum jaanibal barri aw yursila 'alaikum haasiban summa laa tajidoo lakum wakeelaa

words.translation: Or|do you feel secure|that (not)|He will send you back|into it|another time|another time|and send|upon you|a hurricane|of|the wind|and drown you|because|you disbelieved|Then|not|you will find|for you|against Us|therein|an avenger

translations.1: Am amintum aien yu'eedakum feehi taaratan ukhraa fa-yursila 'alaikum qaasifam minar reehi fa-yugh-riqakum bimaa kafartum summa laa tajidoo lakum 'alainaa bihee tabee'aa

words.translation: And certainly|We have honored|(the) children of Adam|(the) children of Adam|and We carried them|on|the land|and the sea|and We have provided them|of|the good things|and We preferred them|over|many|of those whom|We have created|(with) preference

translations.1: Wa-laqad karramnaa Baneee aadama Wa-hamalnaahum fil barri walbahri Wa-razaqnaahum minat taiyibaati Wa-faddalnaahum 'alaa kaseerim mimman khalaqnaa tafdeelaa

words.translation: (The) Day|We will call|all|human beings|with their record|then whoever|is given|his record|in his right hand|then those|will read|their records|and not|they will be wronged|(even as much as) a hair on a date seed

translations.1: Yawma nad'oo kulla unaasim bi-imaamihim faman ootiya kitaabahoo bi-yameenihee fa-ulaaa'ika yaqra'oona kitaabahum Wa-laa yuzlamoona fateelaa

words.translation: And whoever|is|in|this (world)|blind|then he|in|the Hereafter|(will be) blind|and more astray|(from the) path

translations.1: Wa-man kaana fee haaziheee a'maa fahuwa fil aakhirati a'maa Wa-adallu sabeelaa

words.translation: And indeed|they were about (to)|tempt you away|from|that which|We revealed|to you|that you invent|about Us|other (than) it|And then|surely they would take you|(as) a friend

translations.1: Wa-in kaadoo la-yaftinoonaka 'anil lazeee awhainaaa ilaika litaftariya 'alainaaa ghairahoo Wa-izallat takhazooka khaleelaa

words.translation: And if not|[that]|We (had) strengthened you|certainly|you almost|(would) have inclined|to them|(in) something|a little

translations.1: Wa-law-laaa an sabbatnaaka laqad kitta tarkanu ilaihim shai'an qaleela

words.translation: Then|We (would) have made you taste|double|(in) the life|and double|(after) the death|Then|not|you (would) have found|for you|against Us|any helper

translations.1: Izal la-azaqnaaka di'fal hayaati Wa-di'fal mamaati summa laa tajidu laka 'alainaa naseeraa

words.translation: And indeed|they were about|(to) scare you|from|the land|that they evict you|from it|But then|not|they (would) have stayed|after you|except|a little

translations.1: Wa-in kaadoo la-yastafizzoonaka minal ardi liyukhri-jooka minhaa Wa-izal laa yalbasoona khilaafaka illaa qaleelaa

words.translation: (Such is Our) Way|(for) whom|[verily]|We sent|before you|of|Our Messengers|And not|you will find|(in) Our way|any alteration

translations.1: Sunnata man qad arsalnaa qablaka mir Rusulinaa Wa-laa tajidu lisunnatinaa tahweelaa

words.translation: Establish|the prayer|at the decline|(of) the sun|till|(the) darkness|(of) the night|and Quran|at dawn|indeed|the Quran|(at) the dawn|is|ever witnessed

translations.1: Aqimis Salaata liduloo-kish shamsi ilaa ghasaqil laili Wa-quraanal Fajri inna quraa-nal Fajri kaana mashhoodaa

words.translation: And from|the night|arise from sleep for prayer|with it|(as) additional|for you|it may be|that|will raise you|your Lord|(to) a station|praiseworthy

translations.1: Wa-minal laili fatahajjad bihee naafilatal laka 'asaaa any yab'asaka Rabbuka Maqaamam Mahmoodaa

words.translation: And say|My Lord!|Cause me to enter|an entrance|sound|and cause me to exit|an exit|sound|and make|for me|from|near You|an authority|helping

translations.1: Wa-qur Rabbi adkhilnee mudkhala sidqinw Wa-akhrijnee mukhraja sidqinw waj'al lee mil ladunka sultaanan naseeraa

words.translation: And say|Has come|the truth|and perished|the falsehood|Indeed|the falsehood|is|(bound) to perish

translations.1: Wa-qul jaaa'al haqqu Wa-zahaqal baatil; innal baatila kaana zahooqaa

words.translation: And We reveal|from|the Quran|that|it|(is) a healing|and a mercy|for the believers|but not|it increases|the wrongdoers|except|(in) loss

translations.1: Wa-nunazzilu minal quraani maa huwa shifaaa'unw Wa-rahmatullil mu'mineena Wa-laa yazeeduz zaalimeena illaa khasaaraa

words.translation: And when|We bestow favor|on|man|he turns away|and becomes remote|on his side|And when|touches him|the evil|he is|(in) despair

translations.1: Wa-izaaa an'amnaa 'alal insaani a'rada Wa-na-aa bijaani-bihee Wa-izaa massahush sharru kaana ya'oosaa

words.translation: Say|Each|works|on|his manner|but your Lord|(is) most knowing|of who|[he]|(is) best guided|(in) way

translations.1: Qul kulluny ya'malu 'alaa shaakilatihee fa-rabbukum a'lamu biman huwa ahdaa sabeelaa

words.translation: And they ask you|concerning|the soul|Say|The soul|(is) of|(the) affair|(of) my Lord|And not|you have been given|of|the knowledge|except|a little

translations.1: Wa-yas'aloonaka 'anir rooh; qulir roohu min amri rabbee Wa-maaa ooteetum minal 'ilmi illaa qaleelaa

words.translation: And if|We willed|We (would) have surely taken away|that which|We have revealed|to you|Then|not|you would find|for you|concerning it|against Us|any advocate

translations.1: Wa-la'in shi'naa lanaz-habanna billazeee awhainaaa ilaika summa laa tajidu laka bihee 'alainaa wakeelaa

words.translation: Except|a mercy|from|your Lord|Indeed|His Bounty|is|upon you|great

translations.1: Illaa rahmatam mir Rabbik; inna fadlahoo kaana 'alaika kabeeraa

words.translation: Say|If|gathered|the mankind|and the jinn|to|[that]|bring|the like|(of) this|Quran|not|they (could) bring|the like of it|even if|were|some of them|to some others|assistants

translations.1: Qul la'inij tama'atil insu waljinnu 'alaaa aien ya'too bimisli haazal quraani laa ya'toona bimislihee Wa-law kaana ba'duhum liba-'din zaheeraa

words.translation: And verily|We have explained|to mankind|in|this|Quran|from|every|example|but refused|most|(of) the mankind|except|disbelief

translations.1: Wa-laqad sarrafnaa linnaasi fee haazal quraani min kulli masalin fa-abaaa aksarun naasi illaa kufooraa

words.translation: And they say|Never|we will believe|in you|until|you cause to gush forth|for us|from|the earth|a spring

translations.1: Wa-qaaloo lan nu'mina laka hattaa tafjura lanaa minal ardi yamboo'aa

words.translation: Or|you have|for you|a garden|of|date-palms|and grapes|and cause to gush forth|the rivers|within them|abundantly

translations.1: Aw takoona laka jannatum min nakheelinw Wa-'inabin fatufajjiral anhaara khilaalahaa tafjeeraa

words.translation: Or|you cause to fall|the sky|as|you have claimed|upon us|(in) pieces|or|you bring|Allah|and the Angels|before (us)

translations.1: Aw tusqitas samaaa'a kamaa za'amta 'alainaa kisafan aw ta'tiya billaahi wal-malaaa'ikati qabeelaa

words.translation: Or|is|for you|a house|of|ornament|or|you ascend|into|the sky|And never|we will believe|in your ascension|until|you bring down|to us|a book|we could read it|Say|Glorified (is)|my Lord!|What|am I|but|a human|a Messenger

translations.1: Aw yakoona laka baitum min zukhrufin aw tarqaa fis samaaa'i Wa-lan nu'mina liruqiyyika hatta tunazzila 'alainaa kitaaban naqra'uh; qul Subhaana Rabbee hal kuntu illaa basharar Rasoolaa

words.translation: And what|prevented|the people|that|they believe|when|came to them|the guidance|except|that|they said|Has Allah sent|Has Allah sent|a human|Messenger

translations.1: Wa-maa mana'an naasa any yu'minooo iz jaaa'ahumul hudaaa illaaa an qaalooo aba'asal laahu basharar Rasoolaa

words.translation: Say|If|(there) were|in|the earth|Angels|walking|securely|surely We (would) have sent down|to them|from|the heaven|an Angel|(as) a Messenger

translations.1: Qul law kaana fil ardi malaaa-'ikatuien yamshoona mutma'in-neena lanazzalnaa 'alaihim minas samaaa'i malakar Rasoolaa

words.translation: Say|Sufficient is|Allah|(as) a witness|between me|and between you|Indeed He|is|of His slaves|All-Aware|All-Seer

translations.1: Qul kafaa billaahi shaheedam bainee Wa-bainakum; innahoo kaana bi'ibaadihee Khabeeram Baseeraa

words.translation: And whoever|Allah guides|Allah guides|then he (is)|the guided one|and whoever|He lets go astray|then never|you will find|for them|protectors|besides Him|besides Him|And We will gather them|(on) the Day|(of) the Resurrection|on|their faces|blind|and dumb|and deaf|Their abode|(is) Hell|every time|it subsides|We (will) increase (for) them|the blazing fire

translations.1: Wa-maien yahdil laahu fahuwal muhtad; Wa-mai yudlil falan tajida lahum awliyaaa'a min doonih; Wa-nahshuruhum Yawmal Qiyaamati 'alaa wujoohihim umyanw Wa-bukmanw Wa-summaa; ma'waahum Jahannamu kullamaa khabat zidnaahum sa'eeraa

words.translation: That|(is) their recompense|because they|disbelieved|in Our Verses|and said|When|we are|bones|and crumbled particles|will we|surely (be) resurrected|(as) a creation|new

translations.1: Zaalika jazaa'uhum bi-annahum kafaroo bi-aayaatinaa Wa-qaalooo 'a-izaa kunnaa 'izaamanw Wa-rufaatan 'a-innaa la-mab'oosoona khalqan jadeedaa

words.translation: Do not|they see|that|Allah|the One Who|created|the heavens|and the earth|(is) Able|[on]|to|create|the like of them|And He has made|for them|a term|no|doubt|in it|But refused|the wrongdoers|except|disbelief

translations.1: Awalam yaraw annal laahal lazee khalaqas samaawaati wal-arda qaadirun 'alaaa aien yakhluqa mislahum Wa-ja'ala lahum ajalal laa raiba fee; fa-abaz zaalimoona illaa kufooraa

words.translation: Say|If|you|possess|the treasures|(of) the Mercy|(of) my Lord|then|surely you would withhold|(out of) fear|(of) spending|And is|man|stingy

translations.1: Qul law antum tamlikoona khazaaa'ina rahmati Rabbeee izal la-amsaktum khash-yatal infaaq; Wa-kaanal insaanu qatooraa

words.translation: And certainly|We had given|Musa|nine|Signs|clear|so ask|(the) Children of Israel|(the) Children of Israel|when|he came to them|then said|to him|Firaun|Indeed, I|[I] think you|O Musa|(you are) bewitched

translations.1: Wa-laqad aatainaa Moosaa tis'a Aayaatim baiyyinaatin fas'al Baneee Israaa'eela iz jaaa'ahum faqaala lahoo Fir'awnu inee la-azunnuka yaa-Moosaa mas-hooraa

words.translation: He said|Verily|you know|none|has sent down|these|except|(the) Lord|(of) the heavens|and the earth|(as) evidence|and indeed I|[I] surely think you|O Firaun!|(you are) destroyed

translations.1: Qaala laqad 'alimta maaa anzala haaa'ulaaa'i illaa Rabbus samaawaati wal-ardi basaaa'ira Wa-innee la-azun-nuka yaa-Fir'awnu masbooraa

words.translation: So he intended|to|drive them out|from|the land|but We drowned him|and who|(were) with him|all

translations.1: Fa-araada aien yastafizzahum minal ardi fa-aghraqnaahu Wa-mam ma'ahoo jamee'aa

words.translation: And We said|after him|after him|to the Children of Israel|to the Children of Israel|Dwell|(in) the land|then when|comes|(the) promise|(of) the Hereafter|We will bring|you|(as) a mixed crowd

translations.1: Wa-qulnaa min ba'dihee li-Baneee Israaa'eelas kunul arda fa-izaa jaaa'a wa'dul aakhirati ji'naa bikum lafeefaa

words.translation: And with the truth|We sent it down|and with the truth|it descended|And not|We sent you|except|(as) a bearer of glad tidings|and a warner

translations.1: Wa-bilhaqqi anzalnaahu Wa-bilhaqqi nazal; Wa-maaa arsalnaaka illaa mubash-shiranw Wa-nazeeraa

words.translation: And the Quran|We have divided|that you might recite it|to|the people|at|intervals|And We have revealed it|(in) stages

translations.1: Wa-quraanan faraqnaahu litaqra-ahoo 'alan naasi 'alaa muksinw Wa-nazzalnaahu tanzeelaa

words.translation: Say|Believe|in it|or|(do) not|believe|Indeed|those who|were given|the knowledge|before it|before it|when|it is recited|to them|they fall|on their faces|(in) prostration

translations.1: Qul aaminoo biheee aw laa tu'minoo; innal lazeena ootul 'ilma min qabliheee izaa yutlaa 'alaihim yakhirroona lil-azqaani sujjadaa

words.translation: And they say|Glory be to|our Lord!|Indeed|is|(the) promise|(of) our Lord|surely fulfilled

translations.1: Wa-yaqooloona Subhaana Rabbinaaa in kaana wa'du Rabbinaa lamaf'oolaa

words.translation: And they fall|on their faces|weeping|and it increases them|(in) humility

translations.1: Wa-yakhirroona lil-azqaani yabkoona Wa-yazeeduhum khushoo'aa

words.translation: Say|Invoke|Allah|or|invoke|the Most Gracious|By whatever (name)|By whatever (name)|you invoke|to Him (belongs)|the Most Beautiful Names|the Most Beautiful Names|And (do) not|be loud|in your prayers|and not|be silent|therein|but seek|between|that|a way

translations.1: Qulid 'ul laaha awid 'ur Rahmaana ayyam maa tad'oo falahul asmaaa'ul Husnaa; Wa-laa tajhar bi-Salaatika Wa-laa tukhaafit bihaa wabtaghi baina zaalika sabeela

words.translation: And say|All Praise|(is) for Allah|the One Who|has not taken|has not taken|a son|and not|is|for Him|a partner|in|the dominion|and not|is|for Him|any protector|out of|weakness|And magnify Him|(with all) magnificence

translations.1: Wa-qulil hamdu lillaahil lazee lam yattakhiz waladanw Wa-lam yakul lahoo shareekun fil mulki Wa-lam yakul lahoo waliyyum minaz zulli Wa-kabbirhu takbeeraa
